attributes.action: To dismiss the Ban of XL bullies
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament and the government to drop the ban and let all these loved animals go back to their loving heart broken owners
attributes.background: The unfairness that xl bullies are getting out to sleep because of a few incidents are unfair. What happened to never putting a healthy dog down

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
